title: Organoid
subtitle: Organoid Proteomics Analysis
description: Study tissue-specific protein expression and cellular interactions in 3D organoid cultures. Optimized proteomics workflows for precision medicine, disease modeling, and drug screening research.

features.title: Tissue-Specific Profiling
features.description: Analyze complex protein networks from diverse organoid types including brain, liver, and intestinal organoids. Accurately characterize tissue-specific markers and differentiation states.

features.title: Low Sample Input
features.description: Generate comprehensive proteomics data from limited organoid samples. Deep analysis possible from 10-20mg of organoid tissue.

features.title: Drug Response Analysis
features.description: Quantify protein changes before and after drug treatment to reveal mechanisms of action and resistance pathways. Support personalized therapy strategy development.
